name: Shoot Hunter Military Strike Sniper
description:
Free shooting game, the Shoot Hunter Military Strike Sniper is war of one army camp against the others. Shoot & dead is the goal here. Battle adventure shooting is the last commando army soldier’s most powerful ability to intimidate the enemy herd of blood sucking warriors. Group of kidnappers has kidnapped families & demanding for big bucks. Find them and kill them all. The city is under attack as the global strike by the terrorism forces has touched a new high. The counter terrorist strike against the invasion of the city launched after situation got out of city cops hands. People are dying in crossfire shots and terrorism under the nose of swat and city cops growing.
Shoot Hunter Military Strike Sniper features:
• Terrorists have held hostages at the rooftop of buildings
• Bank robbers have held people hostages; they want a free getaway against the lives of the hostages.
• Infiltration tasks against the worst terrorists.
• Save the people from getting hurt of the bullets from terrorists
• A group of kidnappers has kidnapped a whole family & demanding for big bucks. Find them and kill them
• Killers are spreading their territory and hurting people more than ever before. Get into you battle form and eliminate them all
• Criminals are out of control; teach them a lesson by killing them. Give the people some relief
• Streets have become the brutal battle zones. Clear and make the lives of civilians easy with amazing weapons and huge arsenal.
• You can increase the wealth through watching the rewarded video ad and purchase the new guns
• Play the video ad to resume the game in case commando dies during a mission
